metadata.dc:author: Díaz-Yelo, J
Osete Albaladejo, J M
Medina Banegas, A
Argudo Marco, F
Gil Vélez, M
metadata.dc:description: The arc branch syndrome are a group of diseases whose classification and etiology are unknown yet. We has 2 patients with Goldenhar's syndrome and we have studied the etiopathogenicity and treatment in these diseases.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Goldenhar: a propósito de dos casos.
[Goldenhar syndrome: apropos of 2 cases].
